00080 class stEntry {
00081    public:
00082 
00088       void SetPageID(stPageID pageID){
00089          PageID = pageID;
00090       }//end SetPageID
00091 
00095       stPageID GetPageID(){
00096          return PageID;
00097       }//end GetPageID
00098 
00104       void SetDistance(stDistance distance){
00105          Distance = distance;
00106       }//end SetDistance
00107 
00111       stDistance GetDistance(){
00112          return Distance;
00113       }//end GetDistance
00114 
00120       void SetRadius(stDistance radius){
00121          Radius = radius;
00122       }//end SetRadius
00123 
00127       stDistance GetRadius(){
00128          return Radius;
00129       }//end GetRadius
00130 
00136       void SetNext(stEntry * next){
00137          Next = next;
00138       }//end SetNext
00139 
00143       stEntry * GetNext(){
00144          return Next;
00145       }//end GetNext
00146 
00147    private:
00148 
00152       stPageID PageID;
00153 
00157       stDistance Distance;
00158 
00162       stDistance Radius;
00163 
00167       stEntry * Next;
00168 };//end stEntry
